activities:
This submission is made on behalf of MRY US, LLC, a leading social marketing agency headquartered in New York, New York.  MRY US, LLC is the operator of the RepNation program and website (www.repnation.com).  RepNation is an industry-leading ambassador management platform, and since 2006 has been involved in a variety of marketing campaigns in the United States.  Our database of registered ambassadors includes students, mothers, young professionals and other demographics.  The RepNation platform is now expanding into markets internationally.

We operate under the jurisdiction of the Federal Trade Commission and are members of privacy programs, including committees within the Word of Mouth Marketing Association (WOMMA).  We have an in-house monitoring system in place and have coordinated with the American Arbitration Association to handle any unresolved complaints.

An updated Privacy Policy, including reference to the US-EU Safeharbor principles has been posted on the RepNation website.

If you have any questions or require any additional information, please contact us promptly.  

Thank you in advance.
